thread.title: Watch: Bruce Dickinson's Son's Band As Lions Unveils New Song 'Bury My Dead' [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Bruce Dickinson's Son's Band As Lions Unveils New Song 'Bury My Dead' [News]

title: Watch: Bruce Dickinson's Son's Band As Lions Unveils New Song 'Bury My Dead' [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 10 hours ago 0 
As Lions, the band featuring Bruce Dickinson's son Austin on vocals, presented a brand new single titled "Bury My Head." 
The tune comes off the group's upcoming album "Selfish Age," due out on January 20 via Better Noise Records. 
Austin told Revolver about the new track: "'Bury My Dead' is a song about leaving your past behind you. It's very close to my chest because, in starting As Lions and beginning this new adventure, there were a lot of things that I had to leave behind, both as a musician and as a person. 
"I think the same can be said for all people, in all walks of life. In our existence, the only constant is change and sometimes we have to say that final goodbye to the burdens that can no longer teach us or push us. That's one of the many ways in which we grow. I had so much fun writing this, and I truly hope you enjoy blasting it too!" 
You can take a listen below.
